solution_line_template: She'll be on vacation for {num_days} days and drinks {pods_per_day} cups of coffee/pods per day for a total of {num_days}*{pods_per_day} = <<{num_days}*{pods_per_day}={total_pods_needed}>>{total_pods_needed} coffee pods

Her coffee pods come {pods_per_box} in a box and she needs {total_pods_needed} coffee pods so that's {total_pods_needed}/{pods_per_box} = <<{total_pods_needed}/{pods_per_box}={num_boxes_needed}>>{num_boxes_needed} boxes
Each box costs ${price_per_box} and she needs {num_boxes_needed} boxes so that's {price_per_box}*{num_boxes_needed} = $<<{price_per_box}*{num_boxes_needed}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
